cont.entity_b: Smooth finish comparable to sanded wood.

cont.entity_a: Motor was loud with a grinding sound, disappointing quality.
cont.entity_b: Quieter than other brands. Low noise level is acceptable. Relatively quiet.

cont.entity_a: Dust collector hood is desired as a replacement. Dust collection attachment would be an improvement.
cont.entity_b: Dust collection hood is essential but not included. Dust collection works well.
Powerful and accurate with good cutting quality.

cont.entity_a: Heavy-duty and expected to last many years.
cont.entity_b: Feed rollers don't last long and are expensive to replace.

cont.entity_a: Customer service experience was poor due to malfunctions. Planer is junk with poor customer service.

No issues with two knives instead of three.
cont.entity_b: Long blade life and easy to use. Blade changes are easy.

cont.entity_a: Free delivery with purchase, but packaging was poor.
